CAPTIVATED.Definition: attract and hold the interest and attention of; charm

FRAMEWORK.Definition: a basic structure underlying a system, concept, or text.

IMPLIED.Definition: suggested but not directly expressed; implicit

MINE.Definition: dig in (the earth) for coal or other minerals

PROLIFERATION.Definition: rapid increase in the number or amount of something

PROVISION.Definition: a condition or requirement in a legal document

REALM.Definition: a field or domain of activity or interest

SIDE NOTE.Definition: something that's not relevant to the main argument or subject

SUPERNATURAL.Definition: (of a manifestation or event) attributed to some force beyond scientific understanding or the laws of nature.

TYCOON.Definition: a wealthy, powerful person in business or industry

UNTAPPED.Definition: (of a resource) not yet exploited or used
